This screen presents an active summary of your eligible points and your credited points. \nEligible points can only be converted to Credited points that can be redeeemed as and when you connect to the internet via mobile data or wi-fi. \nTo fully utilise your Eligible points we suggest that you connect to the internet at least on a daily basis.

This screen presents a chronological list of Rewards transactions. \nPlease note that different interactions with any ad may produce a different number of points. For instance, a response to an ad (sms, call, etc.) will result in more points than a simple view.

Defined as the sum of Eligible points that have been reconciled. \nEligible points can only become Credited points when connected to the internet. \nWe recommend that members connect their phone to the internet regularly to ensure that all Eligible points are converted to Credited points.

Eligible points are earned whenever you interact with an Ad. \nEligible points can only become Credited points when connected to the internet. \nWe recommend that members connect their phone to the internet regularly to ensure that all Eligible points are converted to Credited points.

Defined as the sum of Eligible points that have been reconciled. \nEligible points can only become Credited points when connected to the internet. \nWe recommend that members connect their phone to the internet regularly to ensure that all Eligible points are converted to Credited points.

This screen is used if /when you wish to redeem Credited points and transfer their cash value into a nominated wallet. \nIt is necessary to have created/selected at least one wallet to redeem credited points. \nBy selecting a wallet and entering a credited value, funds are credited to your wallet and credited points debited from your Credited points.

Please select the events/times when you are prepared to receive personalised ads. \nIf "Stop sending ads when app closed" button is off, you will continue to receive ads even if you close the MyBSNL app. \nIf "Sync only when connected to Wi-Fi" is off, you will only be able to convert eligible to credited points whenever and wherever you have a mobile data connection.
Please select those Topics of Interests that are personally relevant to you. The topics selected will determine the categories of personalised advertising that will receive.
Receive new features, added benefits, improved performance, and smoother experience with the latest release of our MyBSNL Rewards app.
The MyBSNL Rewards program allows any registered Member to earn reward points for participating in curated promotions & special offers. \nThese reward points can be converted to cash at any time.

To join the MyBSNL Rewards program simply provide your basic details: Home Town/City, Gender & Year of Birth. \nUpon completing your Member Profile you will immediately gain membership and start earning reward points.

By default you will be set to Opt-In status meaning that you will receive curated promotions & special offers. \nYou may Opt-Out should you want to stop receiving promotions & special offers and stop earning reward points. You may opt-in again at any time.

The Member Preference screen allows you to determine when & where you receive promotions & special offers. You may also limit the times and frequency of these. \nYou may adjust these preferences at any time to best suit your requirements.

An added benefit of MyBSNL Rewards membership is immediate access to the MyBSNL Rewards AddFone service. \nSimilar in scope to WhatsApp, AddFone provide secured private calls/chats between members of your address book.
Please enter your personal profile required to become a member of My BSNL Rewards and start earning cash rewards today.
